languages.text: {n}Саргона оскаливается.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Машинные духи{/g} этих "украшений" ускорят запуск варп-двигателя... и нашу с тобой смерть, фон Валанциус. Полюбуйся напоследок".

{n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."
languages.original_text: {n}Саргона оскаливается.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Машинные духи{/g} этих "украшений" ускорят запуск варп-двигателя... и нашу с тобой смерть, фон Валанциус. Полюбуйся напоследок".

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The machine spirits of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last sight you'll ever see."

{n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

languages.text: {n}Sargona enseña los dientes.{/n} «Los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de estas "decoraciones" acelerarán el arranque de mi motor de disformidad... y nuestras muertes, von Valancius. Abre bien los ojos, porque esto será lo último que veas».
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona enseña los dientes.{/n} «Los espíritus máquina de estas "decoraciones" acelerarán el arranque de mi motor de disformidad... y nuestras muertes, von Valancius. Abre bien los ojos, porque esto será lo último que veas».

languages.text: {n}萨戈纳露出了牙齿。{/n}“这些‘装饰品’的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}可以加速亚空间引擎启动……也会让我们死得更快。好好看看吧，因为这就是你临死前最后的景象，冯·瓦兰修斯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

traits.locale_text: {n}萨戈纳露出了牙齿。{/n}“这些‘装饰品’的机魂可以加速亚空间引擎启动……也会让我们死得更快。好好看看吧，因为这就是你临死前最后的景象，冯·瓦兰修斯。”

languages.text: {n}La bouche de Sargona s'étire en un rictus.{/n} « Les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} de ces "décorations" accéléreront le démarrage de mon moteur Warp... ainsi que notre mort, von Valancius. Profitez bien du spectacle, car c'est la dernière chose que vous verrez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

traits.locale_text: {n}La bouche de Sargona s'étire en un rictus.{/n} « Les esprits de la machine de ces "décorations" accéléreront le démarrage de mon moteur Warp... ainsi que notre mort, von Valancius. Profitez bien du spectacle, car c'est la dernière chose que vous verrez. »

languages.text: {n}サルゴナは彼の歯をむき出しにする。{/n}「これらの『装飾』の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}は、ワープエンジンの起動…そして私たちの死を加速させる、フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前の目に映る最後のものをよく見るがいい」
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

traits.locale_text: {n}サルゴナは彼の歯をむき出しにする。{/n}「これらの『装飾』の機械精霊は、ワープエンジンの起動…そして私たちの死を加速させる、フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前の目に映る最後のものをよく見るがいい」

languages.text: {n}Sargona dişlerini gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu 'süs eşyalarının' {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g}, öteboyut motorumu daha hızlı çalıştırmamı sağlayacak... Ölümlerimize daha çabuk kavuşacağız von Valancius. Göreceğin son şeylere iyice bir bak."
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona dişlerini gösteriyor.{/n} "Bu 'süs eşyalarının' makine ruhları, öteboyut motorumu daha hızlı çalıştırmamı sağlayacak... Ölümlerimize daha çabuk kavuşacağız von Valancius. Göreceğin son şeylere iyice bir bak."

languages.text: {n}Sargona entblößt seine Zähne.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} dieser 'Dekoration' werden den Start meines Warp-Triebwerks beschleunigen ... und unseren Tod, von Valancius. Seht sie Euch gut an, denn sie ist das Letzte, was Ihr je sehen werdet."
languages.original_text: {n}Sargona bares his teeth.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of these 'decorations' will accelerate the start of my warp engine... and our deaths, von Valancius. Take a good look at the last thing you'll ever see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sargona entblößt seine Zähne.{/n} "Die Maschinengeister dieser 'Dekoration' werden den Start meines Warp-Triebwerks beschleunigen ... und unseren Tod, von Valancius. Seht sie Euch gut an, denn sie ist das Letzte, was Ihr je sehen werdet."
